thread.title: Comment on Lollapalooza reveals 2016 lineups for South American festivals by anthony torres
thread.title_full: Comment on Lollapalooza reveals 2016 lineups for South American festivals by anthony torres

author: anthony torres
title: Comment on Lollapalooza reveals 2016 lineups for South American festivals by anthony torres
text:
Reddit 
Lollapalooza has announced the lineups for its Latin American offshoot festivals in Chile, Argentina, and Brazil. Eminem, Florence and the Machine, and Mumford and Sons will headline all three festivals. 
Lollapalooza Brazil , set to take place March 12th and 13th at Autódromo de Interlagos in São Paulo, will also feature Tame Impala, Noel Gallagher’s High Flying Birds, Alabama Shakes, Jack Ü (Diplo and Skrillex), Snoop Dogg, Die Antwoord, Eagles of Death Metal, The Joy Formidable, Bad Religion, and Cold War Kids, among others. Click here to see the full lineup. 
Lollapalooza Argentina , March 18th and 19th at Hippodromo de San Isidro in Buenos Aires, will also feature Tame Impala, Noel Gallagher’s High Flying Birds, Alabama Shakes, Jack Ü (Diplo and Skrillex), Snoop Dogg, Die Antwoord, Eagles of Death Metal, The Joy Formidable, Bad Religion, Ghost, and A-Trak, among others. Click here to see the full lineup. 
Lollapalooza Chile , set to take place March 19th and 20th at O’Higgins Park in Santiago, will also feature Tame Impala, Noel Gallagher’s High Flying Birds, Alabama Shakes, Jack Ü (Diplo and Skrillex), Snoop Dogg, Die Antwoord, Eagles of Death Metal, The Joy Formidable, Bad Religion, Candlebox, Ghost, A-Trak, and Tinariwen, among others. Click here to see the full lineup. 
Tickets for all three festivals are now on sale. 
Lollapalooza will also hold events in Chicago (July 29th – 31st in Grant Park) and Colombia (Fall TBA) later this year. Artists
